entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 06:20 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle and a few flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:31 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:31 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
